akn:section.akn:heading: Arms and ammunition: immunity from taxation

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2385. Arms and ammunition: immunity from taxation No tax on the sale or transfer of firearms, pistols, revolvers, shells, or cartridges may be imposed on such articles when bought with funds appropriated for a military department. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 137.)
